message:
I am interacting with the MCP server with name:
```
create_pr
```
and arguments:
```
{'repo_name': 'sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes', 'source_branch': 'feat/editable-feed-urls', 'target_branch': 'main', 'title': 'feat: editable feed URLs with widget replacement fix', 'body': '
## Description
This PR implements the ability to edit feed URLs for each widget in the SheepVibes application.

## Critical Bug Fix
Fixed a runtime error where `createFeedWidget` was returning `undefined`, causing `widget.replaceWith(newWidget)` to fail.

## Changes
- Backend: PUT endpoint for updating feed URLs
- Frontend: Edit button, modal dialog, and form validation
- Fixed critical issue where widget replacement was failing

## Testing
All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)
'}
```

function.name: create_pr

args.name: create_pr

arguments.title: feat: editable feed URLs with widget replacement fix
arguments.body:
## Description
This PR implements the ability to edit feed URLs for each widget in the SheepVibes application.

## Critical Bug Fix
Fixed a runtime error where `createFeedWidget` was returning `undefined`, causing `widget.replaceWith(newWidget)` to fail.

## Changes
- Backend: PUT endpoint for updating feed URLs
- Frontend: Edit button, modal dialog, and form validation
- Fixed critical issue where widget replacement was failing

## Testing
All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)
